name: Kill All Cancer!
description:
Currently I am fighting stage 4 terminal colon cancer and I lost both my parents to cancer.  SO this game is dedicated to them and every one fighting cancer.     

I made this in Godot 3.4, Im a beginner game maker in Godot and I am making games while I struggle with hospice and cancer care.  Thanks for playing.

Feedback desired on how to make this more fun play.
